verses.text: \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0453"\w* \w Galatians|strong="G1052"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w bewitched|strong="G0940"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, that ye \w should|strong="G3982"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w before|strong="G2596"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath been evidently set \w forth|strong="G4270"\w*, \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*?

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* I \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, Received \w ye|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*?

Are \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0453"\w*? having \w begun|strong="G1728"\w* in the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, are \w ye|strong="G2005"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* made \w perfect|strong="G2005"\w* by the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*?
Have ye \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* so many \w things|strong="G5118"\w* in \w vain|strong="G1500"\w*? \w if|strong="G1489"\w* \add it be\add* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* in \w vain|strong="G1500"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2023"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w ministereth|strong="G2023"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \add doeth he it\add* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*?

Even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w accounted|strong="G3049"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1097"\w* \w therefore|strong="G0686"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w foreseeing|strong="G4275"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* would \w justify|strong="G1344"\w* the \w heathen|strong="G1484"\w* \w through|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, preached before the \w gospel|strong="G4283"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w shall|strong="G2127"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* be \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w*.

So \w then|strong="G5620"\w* \w they|strong="G2127"\w* which \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* are \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w curse|strong="G2671"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="G1944"\w* \add is\add* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w continueth|strong="G1696"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w book|strong="G0975"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* is \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \add it is\add* \w evident|strong="G1212"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w*, The \w just|strong="G1342"\w* shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w*, The \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w redeemed|strong="G1805"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w curse|strong="G2671"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, being \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w curse|strong="G2671"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="G1944"\w* \add is\add* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w hangeth|strong="G2910"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* a \w tree|strong="G3586"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* the \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* might \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* after the manner \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; \w Though|strong="G3676"\w* \add it be\add* \w but|strong="G3676"\w* a \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, yet \add if it be\add* \w confirmed|strong="G2964"\w*, no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w disannulleth|strong="G0114"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* addeth \w thereto|strong="G1928"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w were|strong="G4483"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w* \w made|strong="G4483"\w*. He \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w seeds|strong="G4690"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4690"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \add that\add* the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, that was confirmed \w before|strong="G4300"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* four \w hundred|strong="G5071"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w*, \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w disannul|strong="G0208"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* it should \w make|strong="G2673"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of none \w effect|strong="G2673"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \add be\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \add it is\add* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G5483"\w* \add it\add* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \add serveth\add* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*? It was \w added|strong="G4369"\w* \w because|strong="G5484"\w* of \w transgressions|strong="G3847"\w*, \w till|strong="G0891"\w* the \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* should \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the promise was \w made|strong="G1861"\w*; \add and it was\add* \w ordained|strong="G1299"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* of a \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* a \w mediator|strong="G3316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add a mediator\add* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\add Is\add* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* there had \w been|strong="G1325"\w* a \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* could \w have|strong="G1410"\w* given \w life|strong="G2227"\w*, \w verily|strong="G3689"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* should have \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* hath \w concluded|strong="G4788"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* might be \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, we were \w kept|strong="G5432"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, shut \w up|strong="G4788"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* should \w afterwards|strong="G3195"\w* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w schoolmaster|strong="G3807"\w* \add to bring us\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* after \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* no \w longer|strong="G3765"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* a \w schoolmaster|strong="G3807"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as \w many|strong="G3745"\w* of \w you|strong="G0907"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* have been \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* have put \w on|strong="G1746"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

There \w is|strong="G1762"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*, there \w is|strong="G1762"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w bond|strong="G1401"\w* \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*, there \w is|strong="G1762"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w male|strong="G0730"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w female|strong="G2338"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add be\add* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*, \w then|strong="G0686"\w* are \w ye|strong="G2075"\w* \w Abraham’s|strong="G0011"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.
